description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=3/3, Mature Content=0/3. B.U.T.T.O.N. is a physical party game for 2-8 players. Race to your controller through physical space, and do whatever it takes to win (or to avoid losing). Act like a monkey, jump up and down, wrestle over the controllers, strip off some clothing, cheat your competitors, and above all, expect the unexpected. Brutally unfair tactics are, after all, totally OK now!
description.short: B.U.T.T.O.N. is a physical party game for 2-8 players. Race to your controller through physical space, and do whatever it takes to win (or to avoid losing). Act like a monkey, jump up and down, wrestle over the controllers, strip off some clothing, cheat your competitors, and above all, expect the unexpected. Brutally unfair tactics are, after all, totally OK now!
